properties.summary:
Ensuring that the current board and future boards accurately represent the racial, gender and other demographics of our community by ensuring that overt or embedded racism, sexism and other inequities are not included in our bylaws website.
Budget requests and unified, or individual comments, posts and or statements to the public, bylaw and website review.
Another comment review ensuring that overt or embedded racism and gender inequities are not included in our comments, posts or statements to the public.
This from another community board, so cb8 has established a racial committee.
My point is that I expected to pass through the committee and come to the full board next month for a vote.
